name: Something Among Meteorites
description:
In the far reaches of space, a deadly rain approaches.

Something Among Meteorites is a game made in 24h for the Hangover Game Jam 2016. Use the directional buttons to move - evade the falling rocks and collect all the gems you see!

Credits:

- mrStrings (AKA Pedro Stringhini): Programming and Game Design

- Saulo Daniel Ferreira Pontes - Art and Game design

- Matheus Wittmann - Main Game Soundtrack and Audio Effects

Also, we would like to thank digifishmusic and RutgerMuller for our awesome Main Menu and Game Over soundtracks; and @w84death for setting up the jam and giving us the opportunity to start 2016 with the right development foot.
